name: InfluenzaVaccineAdministered
title: Influenza Vaccine Administered
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for an influenza vaccination.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent an influenza vaccination (no age restrictions).),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

Influenza virus vaccine, split virus, when administered to individuals 3 years of age and older, for intramuscular use (not otherwise specified)
